Authors:
David M. Spooner, Holly Ruess, Carlos Arbizu, Flor
Rodriguez, Claudia Solï¿½s-Lemus
Title:
Greatly reduced phylogenetic structure in cultivated potato
clade
Abstract:
PREMISE OF THE STUDY: The species boundaries of wild and
cultivated potatoes, Solanum section Petota, are controversial with most
of the taxonomic problems in a clade containing cultivated potatoes. We
here provide the first in-depth phylogenetic study of the cultivated
potato clade to explore possible causes of these problems.
